mapper.select: SELECT rownum rnum, l.lecture_no,l.teacher_number, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_limit, l.lecture_major, l.lecture_personnel, l.lecture_reference, l.lecture_target, l.lecture_start, l.lecture_end, l.lecture_state, l.lecture_check, t.name, t.email FROM lecture L join teacher T ON l.teacher_number=t.teacher_number WHERE l.teacher_number = #{teacher_number} ORDER BY rnum DESC

select l.lecture_no, l.teacher_number, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_limit, l.lecture_major, l.lecture_personnel, l.lecture_reference, l.lecture_target, l.lecture_start, l.lecture_end, l.lecture_state, l.lecture_check, lc.lectureclass_class, lc.lectureclass_no, to_char(lc.lectureclass_start,'hh24:mi') lcstart, to_char(lc.lectureclass_end,'hh24:mi') lcend from lecture L join lectureclass LC on L.lecture_no = LC.lecture_no

select l.lecture_no, l.teacher_number, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_limit, l.lecture_major, l.lecture_personnel, l.lecture_reference, l.lecture_target, l.lecture_start, l.lecture_end, l.lecture_state, l.lecture_check, lc.lectureclass_class, to_char(lc.lectureclass_start,'hh24:mi') lcstart, to_char(lc.lectureclass_end,'hh24:mi') lcend from lecture L join lectureclass LC on L.lecture_no = LC.lecture_no where l.lecture_no = #{lecture_no} and lc.lectureclass_class = #{lectureclass_class}
mapper.update: UPDATE lecture SET lecture_check =1 WHERE lecture_no =#{lecture_no}
